name: Discord Reborn
description:
Beautiful theme all I have to say.
NO MORE UPDATES! I EXCEEDED THE SIZE LIMIT PLEASE CONTACT THE OWNER OF USERSTYLES TO INCREASE MY QUOTA!
additional_info:
Is it fully finished? No. Will it ever be finished? No since Discord will keep making changes but I will keep the theme 100% up to date!
DISCORD APP THEMES Themes
